dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I'm a little skeptical about this whole "amazing management team" thing. I mean, every company says that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm a little skeptical about this whole amazing management team thing. I mean, every company says that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But hold on—this is coming from Deloitte's survey of 65 CEOs in Kazakhstan. That's a pretty solid group of people to get feedback from.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But hold on-this is coming from Deloitte's survey of sixty five CEOs in Kazakhstan. That's a pretty solid group of people to get feedback from.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC surveyed 71 CEOs from major Kazakh companies, active across various sectors of economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but still—65 CEOs? That feels like a small sample size, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but stillminus sixty five CEOs? That feels like a small sample size, doesn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Actually, for a country like Kazakhstan, that's significant. And they specifically called out Kaspi.kz's Tokyo IPO as a major achievement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Actually, for a country like Kazakhstan, that's significant. And they specifically called out the website 's Tokyo I P O as a major achievement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year we successfully completed Kaspi.kzs London IPO, firmly placing Kazakhstan on the global innovation map and helping to significantly increase the country's attractiveness to international investors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Tokyo IPO, right… I remember that. But is that really enough to put Kazakhstan on the map globally?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Tokyo I P O, right... I remember that. But is that really enough to put Kazakhstan on the map globally?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, according to the survey respondents, it significantly boosted the country's appeal to international investors. That's not nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, according to the survey respondents, it significantly boosted the country's appeal to international investors. That's not nothing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year we successfully completed Kaspi.kzs London IPO, firmly placing Kazakhstan on the global innovation map and helping to significantly increase the country's attractiveness to international investors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, maybe. But what about the management team? Are they really that innovative?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, maybe. But what about the management team? Are they really that innovative?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They mentioned the CFO's strategic vision and the team's professionalism. Plus, Kaspi.kz is known for their mobile products—like, they're pushing digital transformation there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They mentioned the C F O's strategic vision and the team's professionalism. Plus, the website is known for their mobile products-like, they're pushing digital transformation there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents mentioned the successful IPO of Kaspi.kz, the professionalism of its management team, the company's innovative technology and the strategic vision of its CEO.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Digital transformation sounds good on paper, but does it actually improve people's lives?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Digital transformation sounds good on paper, but does it actually improve people's lives?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's their stated mission, and Deloitte's been running this survey globally for 12 years—they don't just hand out praise for no reason.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's their stated mission, and Deloitte's been running this survey globally for twelve years-they don't just hand out praise for no reason.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting its CEO Survey worldwide for 24 years and for the past 9 years in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fair point. Still, I wonder how much of this is just corporate fluff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fair point. Still, I wonder how much of this is just corporate fluff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Maybe, but when other CEOs are pointing to Kaspi.kz as a standout… that's pretty telling, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Maybe, but when other CEOs are pointing to the website as a standout... that's pretty telling, don't you think?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, okay—I can see that. It does add some weight to their claims.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, okay-I can see that. It does add some weight to their claims.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And with Deloitte backing it up for seven years locally? That consistency matters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And with Deloitte backing it up for seven years locally? That consistency matters.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting its CEO Survey worldwide for 24 years and for the past 9 years in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, you've convinced me. It sounds like there's some real substance here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, you've convinced me. It sounds like there's some real substance here.
